name: "THE GOVERNMENT DOSEN'T WANT YOU TO POOP"
name_original: "THE GOVERNMENT DOSEN'T WANT YOU TO POOP"
description:
THE GOVERNMENT DOSEN'T WANT YOU TO POOP.......WHY?? find out.....

a text based comedy game for the ms paint game jam 2022.......pls play all the three endings to actually get the TRUE experience

hey guys....This is a text based 'comedy''.....pretty much my first attempt at writing my own code instead of copying from youtube tutorials...and writing a subpar comedy......comedy in itself is very hard, so to challenge myself even more I choose to make the game around something as weird as this.........There are 3 main endings in this story and I suggest you to try them all....Just to compel you ...On has an assassination.....on has a millionaire....and one has a reality check....hope you like them all...

O yes.....This game also won the 'best story' award in the 2022 Ms Paint Jam......
developers: Games made by a 16 Year old
